title.narrative: NATIONAL CAPACITIES FOR KM AND REPORTING

description.narrative: Improved national and sub-national capacities to systematically collect, analyse and use desegregated data and other forms of information to monitor, inform policy decisions, and report on the situation of children and child poverty in all of its dimensions, using an equity-based approach

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Improved national and sub-national capacities to systematically collect, analyse and use desegregated data and other forms of information to monitor, inform policy decisions, and report on the situation of children and child poverty in all of its dimensions, using an equity-based approach

description.narrative: UNICEF- the knowledge booker is leading innovative data collection and dissemination to change the lives of over 180,000 children under 18 yrs in Belize. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:21/12/2019

title.narrative: Number of RCCE messages produced and disseminated with UNICEF support, adapted for target groups, in the reporting year [COVID]
Local governments (incl. municipalities) with functioning mechanisms for child/adolescent and/or community participation in local planning, budgeting and monitoring processes

baseline.value: Municipal Government has signed an agreement to work towards making their municipality child freindly

target.value: 2021:Local governments (incl. municipalities) with implemented plans and budgets that reflect local child priorities, including priorities of the most vulnerable children (Decentralisation and local governance)

actual.value: 2019:100% of municipalities has established Children Advisory Bodies for children's involvement in Local government, a Technical steering committees consisting of key stakeholders in the respective municipalities, strategic plan with indicators to facilitate monitoring. 5/9 municipalities have allocated

title.narrative: Draft SITAN on Children in Belize
National government measurement of child poverty usingmeasures monetary and multidimensional

actual.value: 2020:UNICEF has been instrumental in advocating for -and providing technical expertise for- the upcoming development of the first national Multidimensional Poverty Index: we organized a national conference on MPI, build the capacities of key government staff on MPI, and provided Belize with a methodology

title.narrative: Existence of disaggregated national household survey data on child-focused targets of SDGs collected within the preceding 5 years.
